text: The following is a comprehensive discography of American DJ and producer Porter Robinson. His discography comprises two studio albums, two remix albums, four extended plays, twenty-one singles, and thirteen music videos. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+List of studio albums, with release date and selected chart positions shown !
